name: Daniel Gamburg
biography:
Daniel Gamburg is the co-founder and artistic director of Bare Witness Productions.

Completing a Bachelor of Arts in Cinema from SFSU in 1993, he has taught Film History, Criticism and Documentary practice. He has also studied documentary photography and acting.

Bare Witness Productions is an independent production co-operative in San Fransicso which uses structured improvisation techniques and a documentary style approach to filmmaking to create works dealing with current social issues.

His first feature film is due to be completed in 2002.
